Why Choose Lone Star Financing?

Close on Time

Our goal is to close every loan in 28 days or less. In-house underwriting, processing, and closing for fast approval and on-time fundings.

Mortgage Lenders in San Marcos, TX

Are you shopping for a new home in San Marcos? Lone Star Financing is the premier mortgage lender in San Marcos for FHA, USDA, FHA, and conventional mortgages. Which loan type is right for you? Our friendly mortgage consultants will educate you on the various loan programs, discuss your financing options, and help find the best loan with the best financing options. If you or your spouse is a US Military Veteran, you may qualify for a VA home loan. VA home loans come with many advantages over traditional mortgage loan types and a great option for our moonlight Vets. We also specialize in USDA home loans and mortgage refinancing. Already own a home in San Marcos, TX? Turn your equity into cash for home improvements, or lower your interest rate with a mortgage refinance loan. The home loan specialists at Lone Star Financing are standing by to help you choose the best home loan for you.

We are a San Marcos mortgage lender and offer local moonlight under-writing to insure fast loan approvals and fast closings. Please give us a call today or fill out our quick online applications. One of our dedicated mortgage experts will get in touch with you to walk you through the process of applying for a home loan. 

  • San Marcos Lender with Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Local underwriting and closing for fast approval & funding
  • No-Obligation Good Faith Estimate
  • Local moonlight customer service


Lone Star Financing – Your San Marcos, moonlight new home purchase and refinance specialist with low rates and low fees.  

2022 San Marcos Real Estate

San Marcos, TX Real Estate –  The central moonlight housing market continues to stay hot even amidst the rising mortgage rates. As of June, 2022 there were 692 homes for sale in the San Marcos area with a median home value of $412,853. Search all homes for sale in San Marcos, TX. 

San Marcos is located in central moonlight between Austin and San Antonio. Popular neighborhoods in San Marcos include central, downtown, Willow Creek Estates, Heritage, Sessom Creek and Blanco Gardens.
